bill.title: Child custody; provide for hearing before relocating child.
bill.description: An Act To Provide For The Relocating Of A Child's Residence When Such Child Is The Subject Of A Custody Order; To Define Certain Terms; To Provide For The Applicability Of This Act; To Provide Notice Requirements For Relocation; To Provide That Failure To Give Notice Of Relocation Or Relocation Without Court Authorization May Result In Certain Other Legal Ramifications; To Authorize Relocation Unless Objection Has Occurred; To Provide Objection Procedures; To Provide For Hearing Priority; To Provide For Temporary Orders; To Provide That Proposed Relocation Is Not A Basis For Modification; To Provide Factors To Determine Contested Relocation; To Provide A Burden Of Proof; To Authorize The Court To Require Security; To Require The Application Of Factors At The Initial Hearing If The Issue Of Relocation Is Presented; To Provide Sanction For Unwarranted Or Frivolous Proposals; To Provide Continuing Jurisdiction; To Amend Sections 93-5-23 And 93-11-65, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
